item.name: Zabbix proxy: Preprocessing queue
item.description: Count of values enqueued in the preprocessing queue.

item.description: Average percentage of time configuration syncer processes have been busy in the last minute.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: Utilization of configuration syncer processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"configuration syncer"}%

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Values waiting to be sent
item.description: Number of values in the proxy history table waiting to be sent to the server.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Queue over 10 minutes
item.description: Number of monitored items in the queue which are delayed at least by 10 minutes.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: More than 100 items having missing data for more than 10 minutes
trigger.description: zabbix[stats,{$IP},{$PORT},queue,10m] item is collecting data about how many items are missing data for more than 10 minutes.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Queue
item.description: Number of monitored items in the queue which are delayed at least by 6 seconds.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Configuration cache, % used
item.description: Availability statistics of Zabbix configuration cache. Percentage of used buffer.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the configuration cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing CacheSize in the zabbix_proxy.conf configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Required performance
item.description: Required performance of Zabbix proxy, in new values per second expected.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Uptime
item.description: Uptime of Zabbix proxy process in seconds.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: has been restarted (uptime < 10m)

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Version
item.description: Version of Zabbix proxy.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Zabbix proxy version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: VMware cache, % used
item.description: Availability statistics of Zabbix vmware cache. Percentage of used buffer.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the vmware cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing VMwareCacheSize in the zabbix_proxy.conf configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: History write cache, % used
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Percentage of used history buffer. History cache is used to store item values. A high number indicates performance problems on the database side.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the history cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing HistoryCacheSize in the zabbix_proxy.conf configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: History index cache, % used
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Percentage of used history index buffer. History index cache is used to index values stored in history cache.

trigger.name: Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the history index cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing HistoryIndexCacheSize in the zabbix_proxy.conf configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed numeric (float) values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed float values.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed log values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed log values.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed not supported values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of times item processing resulted in item becoming unsupported or keeping that state.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed character values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed character/string values.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed text values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed text values.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed numeric (unsigned) values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed numeric (unsigned) values.

item.name: Zabbix proxy: Number of processed values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Total number of values processed by Zabbix server or Zabbix proxy, except unsupported items.

macro.description: Maximum average percentage of time processes busy in the last minute (default is 75).
Minimum average percentage of time processes busy in the last minute (default is 65).

resource.name: Zabbix proxy: Zabbix data gathering process busy %
Zabbix proxy: Zabbix internal process busy %
Zabbix proxy: Zabbix cache usage, % used

Zabbix proxy: Zabbix internal process busy %
